abstracts.cdata!:
The purpose of this project is to build
            a National Trunk Road from Lianyungang to Huoerguosi.  The
            western part of the road, the Luoyang-Sanmenxia Expressway,
            is located to the south of the Yellow River in Henan
            province, and is the focus of the present Environmental
            Assessment (EA). This report finds that the road's
            construction will have some adverse effects on the
            surrounding environment; construction will lead to more
            water and soil loss in the area; blown dust and asphalt
            smoke may impact the environment; noise will affect the
            residential sites in the vicinity; and flora and indigenous
            animal species will be affected.  None of the plant or
            animal species in this area, however, is considered rare or
            endangered. Cultural relics buried in the area will be
            salvaged through archaeological means. Planting of trees and
            grasses on the median strips and roadsides will mitigate
            erosion and noise problems, as well as improve the design aesthetically.
